title: ettanai kaTrAlum
sahitya:
ettanai kaTrAlum ettanai kETTAlum inbam udittiDumO manamE


anupallavi

  shuddhanai jaya parAshakti paramAtmanait-tudittavan anbarai madittu vaNangAmal


caraNam    puttakap-pUccikku cittam teLiyumO puruSan illAdavaTkup-puttiranuNDAmO
bhatti paravashattAl pADi aruL kUDip-pAsham aghanr-Anma nEsam perAmalE
